article_title: Michael E. Kraft: With little hope for carbon tax, electric car credits remain vital

og.description: GREEN BAY — Electric vehicles are among the most promising of green technologies, offering cleaner air and lower greenhouse gas emissions than those produced with gasoline-powered vehicles.
